[dscrd-hush] <ITM> its will be average of over 10000 blocks.
- We create a website that has all voting options
- A pool or solo miner selects all the options he wants his coinbase address to support.

- A list of all pools and there voting will be display. Now users can decide which pool to mine.
just an option.
